com.fasterxml.storemate.client

Class CallFailure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.storemate.client.CallFailure

  • public class CallFailure
extends Object
    Container for details of a single failed call to a server.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected long _callTime 
      protected Throwable _error 
      protected String _errorMessage
      Specific error message, either constructed explicitly, or extracted from JSON response.
      protected byte[] _rawResponse
      Excerpt of the underlying error message.
      protected ServerNode _server 
      protected int _statusCode 
      protected int _timeTakenMsecs 
      static int HTTP_STATUS_CLIENT_TIMEOUT_ON_READ 
      static int HTTP_STATUS_CUSTOM_FAIL_CLIENT_MESSAGE
      Constant used as a placeholder for internal call failure caused by a problem on client side (before trying to call server), as identified by given message
      static int HTTP_STATUS_CUSTOM_FAIL_CLIENT_THROWABLE
      Constant used as a placeholder for internal call failure caused by an exception thrown on client side.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CallFailure(ServerNode server, int statusCode, long callTime, long endTime, String errorMsg, byte[] responseExcerpt) 
      CallFailure(ServerNode server, int statusCode, long callTime, long endTime, Throwable error, byte[] responseExcerpt) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CallFailure clientInternal(ServerNode server, long callTime, long endTime, String msg)
      Factory method for "internal failure"; case where something in our code threw an exception causing individual call to fail, but we did not get an exception.
      static CallFailure clientInternal(ServerNode server, long callTime, long endTime, Throwable cause)
      Factory method for "internal failure"; case where something in our code threw an exception causing individual call to fail, and we have an exception indicating what happened.
      static CallFailure formatException(ServerNode server, int statusCode, long callTime, long endTime, String msg)
      Factory method for "could not parse response" failure.
      static CallFailure general(ServerNode server, int statusCode, long callTime, long endTime, String msg)
      Factory method for general "not sure what or why failed" failure
      long getCallTime()
      Accessor for getting timestamp of when request attempt was made ("start time")
      Throwable getCause()
      Accessor that can be used to find out client-side Throwable that caused call to fail, if failure was due to a Throwable being thrown.
      long getEndTime() 
      String getErrorMessage()
      Accessor for explicitly provided failure message; either from code that knows what failed, or from response message successfully parsed.
      String getResponseExtract()
      Accessor for getting actual underlying error message (or, if very long, extract of first N bytes).
      ServerNode getServer() 
      int getStatusCode() 
      int getTimeTakenMsecs() 
      static CallFailure ioProblem(ServerNode server, int statusCode, long callTime, long endTime, String msg, Exception e)
      Factory method for general I/O failure, caused by HTTP request or response processing.
      boolean isRetriable()
      Accessor that can be called to determine whether failure is of transient type, and might be resolved by retrying after a brief delay.
      static CallFailure timeout(ServerNode server, long callTime, long endTime)
      Factory method called to indicate that a failure was due to timeout; either for actual timed out call, or not being able to make a call due to operation time out
      String toString()

      • timeout

        public static CallFailure timeout(ServerNode server,
                  long callTime,
                  long endTime)
        Factory method called to indicate that a failure was due to timeout; either for actual timed out call, or not being able to make a call due to operation time out

      • clientInternal

        public static CallFailure clientInternal(ServerNode server,
                         long callTime,
                         long endTime,
                         Throwable cause)
        Factory method for "internal failure"; case where something in our code threw an exception causing individual call to fail, and we have an exception indicating what happened.

      • clientInternal

        public static CallFailure clientInternal(ServerNode server,
                         long callTime,
                         long endTime,
                         String msg)
        Factory method for "internal failure"; case where something in our code threw an exception causing individual call to fail, but we did not get an exception.

      • getServer

        public ServerNode getServer()

      • getStatusCode

        public int getStatusCode()

      • getCause

        public Throwable getCause()
        Accessor that can be used to find out client-side Throwable that caused call to fail, if failure was due to a Throwable being thrown.

      • getCallTime

        public long getCallTime()
        Accessor for getting timestamp of when request attempt was made ("start time")

      • getEndTime

        public long getEndTime()

      • getTimeTakenMsecs

        public int getTimeTakenMsecs()

      • getErrorMessage

        public String getErrorMessage()
        Accessor for explicitly provided failure message; either from code that knows what failed, or from response message successfully parsed.

      • getResponseExtract

        public String getResponseExtract()
        Accessor for getting actual underlying error message (or, if very long, extract of first N bytes). Null for failures that did not get a response.

      • isRetriable

        public boolean isRetriable()
        Accessor that can be called to determine whether failure is of transient type, and might be resolved by retrying after a brief delay.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
